front.title: A DNS Resource Record for IPv6 Segment Routing (SR6)

abstract.t: This document defines the IPv6 Segment Routing (SR6) Resource Record (RR). This Resource Record gives a path to reach a given destination. The path is encoded with an IPv6 Segment List. The host uses a Segment Routing Header (SRH) derived from the SR6 RR to reach the destination.
